text:
Rihanna’s Breakup Advice to Fan Proves Why She’s the Gift We Don’t Deserve

We all know that Rihanna’s pretty much the baddest bitch on the planet, but even bad gals have their soft spots and for RiRi that’s a fan in need. Today it appears as though the…
